author: Tess Owen, Anne Torpey
title: New York City Has Released 900 Inmates Over Coronavirus Fears
description: Rikers Island’s top doctor took to Twitter to share a grim outlook for the situation at the jail, calling it a “public health disaster unfolding before our eyes.”
content:
New York City has released 900 people from its jails in an effort to curb the spread of coronavirus among inmates. 
 Mayor Bill de Blasios announcement Tuesday afternoon came amid growing numbers of confirmed COVID-19 cases in guards and detainees at Rikers … [+1453 chars]
